description: Try our easy to follow Broccoli, Pea & Avocado Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Broccoli, Pea & Avocado Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe avocado, peeled, pitted, and chopped
1 fresh ginger root, 2 cm, peeled and grated

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the sesame and chia seeds in a dry saucepan over medium heat, shaking the pan a couple of times, for 30 seconds, until golden. Remove from the pan and let cool.
Blanch the broccoli with the peas in a large saucepan of boiling water for 2 minutes, until the broccoli is just tender but still firm. Drain, rinse under cold water, and drain again.
Put the broccoli and peas into a large salad bowl. Add the avocado, spinach leaves, alfalfa, mint, and toasted seeds.
Whisk the lime juice, oil, and ginger together in a small bowl and season with salt and black pepper. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss well to mix.
